Acknowledgment
--------------

Palladium has been developed by the Data Science team of the Otto
Group Business Intelligence Department (Otto Group BI). The authors
would like to thank Benjamin Bossan, Timo Duchrow, Josef Feigl, Henner
Graubitz, Hendrik Makait, Christian Rammig, Grzegorz Rygielski for
giving valuable input regarding requirements and use cases, for
testing intermediate versions and providing feedback on how to improve
Palladium.
